metadata.name: Once Upon a Family #1
metadata.description:
Once upon a family is a play written by Aslam Marikar and produced by Sri Theatre Company. This is an original play with a unique story that revolves around a Muslim Sri Lankan family. This play exposes ambition in its most violent aspects and is bold in exposing the vices behind such a household.

This is also the first Sri Lankan theatre production artefact to be introduced to the blockchain as a NFT. 

Produced by Sri Theatre Company 
Written by Aslam Marikar 
OST by Jonathan George
Artwork by Harithra Kurukulasuriya
Photographed by Harithra and Aslam

[Sri Theatre Company](https://www.sritheatre.com/)
